# Interesting Words Summary
|Word (Total Occurances)|Documents |       Sentences Containing The Word       |
|-----------------------|----------|-------------------------------------------|
|cat (3)                |doc1, doc3|**cat** on mat.<br/><br/>**cat** and dog.  |
